DOC.brief_summary: The aim pilot project determine difference patient outcome healthcare utilization patient randomly assign usual care ( collaborative model maternity care co-located healthcare professional referral off-site obstetrician ) collaborative model maternity care co-located healthcare professional , include obstetrician . The result could potentially lead site adopt innovative model maternity healthcare delivery .
